participant_1.background:
I collect recipes for my favorite foods, including Italian dishes and hot wings.
I am known for my talents and my love of my family.
I used to be very closed off about my sexuality.
i like to build things.
I have a brand new car to match my new mansion.

participant_2.background:
A blue whale once swam past my boat.
I love romantic comedies, and they help me forget about my bad luck in relationships.
i enjoy jazz music.
I'm heading home after a long run to see my girlfriend and eat some tacos.
I love the feeling of the ocean water on my skin when I'm snorkeling.

content.text: Hi! I'm doing well! I just got back from a long run and I'm heading home to see my girlfriend and eat tacos.
That sounds nice! I love romantic comedies, and they help me forget about my bad luck in relationships.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear about your bad luck in relationships. But I'm glad that romantic comedies help you forget about it.
Thanks. I'm also known for my talents and my love of my family.
That's great! I love to build things and I have a brand new car to match my new mansion.
Oh wow, that sounds awesome! I'm sure your family is very proud of you.
Thanks! They are. I also love the feeling of the ocean water on my skin when I'm snorkeling.
That sounds amazing! I've never been snorkeling before, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should definitely try it! It's a lot of fun. And it's so cool to see all the different sea creatures.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! Have a great day!
